;;;218    void GLCD_Init (void) { 
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
000004  48f8              LDR      r0,|L1.1000|
;;;219      static unsigned short driverCode;
;;;220    
;;;221      /* Enable clock for SSP1, clock = CCLK / 2                                  */
;;;222      LPC_SC->PCONP       |= 0x00000400;
000006  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]
000008  f4416180          ORR      r1,r1,#0x400
00000c  f8401be4          STR      r1,[r0],#0xe4
;;;223      LPC_SC->PCLKSEL0    |= 0x00200000;
000010  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]
000012  f4411100          ORR      r1,r1,#0x200000
000016  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]
;;;224    
;;;225      /* Configure the LCD Control pins                                           */
;;;226      LPC_PINCON->PINSEL9 &= 0xF0FFFFFF;
000018  48f4              LDR      r0,|L1.1004|
00001a  6a41              LDR      r1,[r0,#0x24]
00001c  f0216170          BIC      r1,r1,#0xf000000
000020  6241              STR      r1,[r0,#0x24]
000022  4cf3              LDR      r4,|L1.1008|
;;;227      LPC_GPIO4->FIODIR   |= 0x30000000;
000024  6821              LDR      r1,[r4,#0]
000026  f0415140          ORR      r1,r1,#0x30000000
00002a  f8441980          STR      r1,[r4],#-0x80
;;;228      LPC_GPIO4->FIOSET    = 0x20000000;
00002e  f04f5100          MOV      r1,#0x20000000
000032  f8c41098          STR      r1,[r4,#0x98]
;;;229    
;;;230      /* SSEL1 is GPIO output set to high                                         */
;;;231      LPC_GPIO0->FIODIR   |= 0x00000040;
000036  6821              LDR      r1,[r4,#0]
000038  f0410140          ORR      r1,r1,#0x40
00003c  6021              STR      r1,[r4,#0]
;;;232      LPC_GPIO0->FIOSET    = 0x00000040;
00003e  f04f0540          MOV      r5,#0x40
000042  61a5              STR      r5,[r4,#0x18]
;;;233      LPC_PINCON->PINSEL0 &= 0xFFF03FFF;
000044  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]
000046  f421217c          BIC      r1,r1,#0xfc000
00004a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]
;;;234      LPC_PINCON->PINSEL0 |= 0x000A8000;
00004c  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]
00004e  f4412128          ORR      r1,r1,#0xa8000
000052  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]
;;;235    
;;;236      /* Enable SPI in Master Mode, CPOL=1, CPHA=1                                */
;;;237      /* Max. 25 MBit used for Data Transfer @ 100MHz                              */
;;;238      LPC_SSP1->CR0        = 0xC7;
000054  48e7              LDR      r0,|L1.1012|
000056  f04f01c7          MOV      r1,#0xc7
00005a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]
;;;239      LPC_SSP1->CPSR       = 0x02;
00005c  f04f0102          MOV      r1,#2
000060  6101              STR      r1,[r0,#0x10]
;;;240      LPC_SSP1->CR1        = 0x02;
000062  6041              STR      r1,[r0,#4]
;;;241    
;;;242      delay(5);                             /* Delay 50 ms                        */
000064  f04f0005          MOV      r0,#5
000068  f7fffffe          BL       delay
00006c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00006e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
000072  61e5              STR      r5,[r4,#0x1c]
000074  2073              MOVS     r0,#0x73
000076  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
00007a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00007c  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
000080  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000082  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
000086  0206              LSLS     r6,r0,#8
000088  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00008a  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
00008e  4330              ORRS     r0,r0,r6
000090  61a5              STR      r5,[r4,#0x18]
;;;243      driverCode = rd_reg(0x00);
000092  4dd9              LDR      r5,|L1.1016|
;;;244    
;;;245      /* Start Initial Sequence --------------------------------------------------*/
;;;246      wr_reg(0x01, 0x0100);                 /* Set SS bit                         */
000094  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
000098  80a8              STRH     r0,[r5,#4]            ;243
00009a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00009c  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;247      wr_reg(0x02, 0x0700);                 /* Set 1 line inversion               */
0000a0  f44f61e0          MOV      r1,#0x700
0000a4  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;248      wr_reg(0x04, 0x0000);                 /* Resize register                    */
0000aa  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000ac  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0000ae  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;249      wr_reg(0x08, 0x0207);                 /* 2 lines front, 7 back porch        */
0000b2  f2402107          MOV      r1,#0x207
0000b6  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
0000b8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;250      wr_reg(0x09, 0x0000);                 /* Set non-disp area refresh cyc ISC  */
0000bc  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000be  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
0000c0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;251      wr_reg(0x0A, 0x0000);                 /* FMARK function                     */
0000c4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000c6  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
0000c8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;252      wr_reg(0x0C, 0x0000);                 /* RGB interface setting              */
0000cc  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000ce  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
0000d0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;253      wr_reg(0x0D, 0x0000);                 /* Frame marker Position              */
0000d4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000d6  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
0000d8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;254      wr_reg(0x0F, 0x0000);                 /* RGB interface polarity             */
0000dc  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000de  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
0000e0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;255    
;;;256      /* Power On sequence -------------------------------------------------------*/
;;;257      wr_reg(0x10, 0x0000);                 /* Reset Power Control 1              */
0000e4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000e6  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
0000e8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;258      wr_reg(0x11, 0x0000);                 /* Reset Power Control 2              */
0000ec  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000ee  2011              MOVS     r0,#0x11
0000f0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;259      wr_reg(0x12, 0x0000);                 /* Reset Power Control 3              */

0000f8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;260      wr_reg(0x13, 0x0000);                 /* Reset Power Control 4              */

000100  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;261      delay(20);                            /* Discharge cap power voltage (200ms)*/

000106  f7fffffe          BL       delay
;;;262      wr_reg(0x10, 0x12B0);                 /* SAP, BT[3:0], AP, DSTB, SLP, STB   */

;;;263      wr_reg(0x11, 0x0007);                 /* DC1[2:0], DC0[2:0], VC[2:0]        */

;;;264      delay(5);                             /* Delay 50 ms                        */

00011e  f7fffffe          BL       delay
;;;265      wr_reg(0x12, 0x01BD);                 /* VREG1OUT voltage                   */

;;;266      delay(5);                             /* Delay 50 ms                        */

;;;267      wr_reg(0x13, 0x1400);                 /* VDV[4:0] for VCOM amplitude        */

000138  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;268      wr_reg(0x29, 0x000E);                 /* VCM[4:0] for VCOMH                 */

00013e  2029              MOVS     r0,#0x29

;;;269      delay(5);                             /* Delay 50 ms                        */

;;;333

;;;335         I/D=10 (Horizontal : increment, Vertical : increment)
;;;336         AM=1   (address is updated in vertical writing direction)                */
;;;337      wr_reg(0x03, 0x1038);

;;;341    }
000346  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;342    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_WindowMax PROC
;;;349    
;;;350    void GLCD_WindowMax (void) {
00034a  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;351    
;;;352      wr_reg(0x50, 0);                      /* Horizontal GRAM Start Address      */
00034c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00034e  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
000350  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;353      wr_reg(0x51, HEIGHT-1);               /* Horizontal GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000354  21ef              MOVS     r1,#0xef
000356  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
000358  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;354      wr_reg(0x52, 0);                      /* Vertical   GRAM Start Address      */
00035c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00035e  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
000360  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;355      wr_reg(0x53, WIDTH-1);                /* Vertical   GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000364  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
000368  f240113f          MOV      r1,#0x13f
00036c  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00036e  f7ffbffe          B.W      wr_reg
;;;356    }
;;;357    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_PutPixel PROC
;;;365    
;;;366    void GLCD_PutPixel (unsigned int x, unsigned int y) {
000372  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
000374  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;367    
;;;368      wr_reg(0x20, y);
000376  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
000378  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00037a  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;369      wr_reg(0x21, WIDTH-1-x);
00037e  f2a4143f          SUB      r4,r4,#0x13f
000382  4260              RSBS     r0,r4,#0
000384  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
000386  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
000388  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;370      wr_cmd(0x22);
00038c  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
00038e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;371      wr_dat(TextColor);
000392  4819              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000394  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; TextColor
000396  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
00039a  f7ffbffe          B.W      wr_dat
;;;372    }
;;;373    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_SetTextColor PROC
;;;380    
;;;381    void GLCD_SetTextColor (unsigned short color) {
00039e  4916              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
;;;382    
;;;383      TextColor = color;
0003a0  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;384    }
0003a2  4770              BX       lr
;;;385    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_SetBackColor PROC
;;;392    
;;;393    void GLCD_SetBackColor (unsigned short color) {
0003a4  4914              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
;;;394    
;;;395      BackColor = color;
0003a6  8048              STRH     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;396    }
0003a8  4770              BX       lr
;;;397    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_Clear PROC
;;;404    
;;;405    void GLCD_Clear (unsigned short color) {
0003aa  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
0003ac  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;406      unsigned int   i;
;;;407    
;;;408      GLCD_WindowMax();
0003ae  f7fffffe          BL       GLCD_WindowMax
;;;409    
;;;410      wr_reg(0x20, 0);
0003b2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0003b4  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0003b6  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;411      wr_reg(0x21, 0);
0003ba  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0003bc  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
0003be  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;412      wr_cmd(0x22);
0003c2  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
0003c4  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;413      wr_dat_start();
0003c8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_start
;;;414      for(i = 0; i < (WIDTH*HEIGHT); i++)
0003cc  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
0003ce  f44f3596          MOV      r5,#0x12c00
                  |L1.978|
;;;415        wr_dat_only(color);
0003d2  4630              MOV      r0,r6
0003d4  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_only
0003d8  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;414
0003da  42ac              CMP      r4,r5                 ;414
0003dc  d3f9              BCC      |L1.978|
0003de  4904              LDR      r1,|L1.1008|
0003e0  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40              ;414
0003e2  3980              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x80           ;414
0003e4  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]         ;414
                  |L1.998|
;;;416      wr_dat_stop();
;;;417    }
0003e6  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.1000|
                          DCD      0x400fc0c4
                  |L1.1004|
                          DCD      0x4002c000
                  |L1.1008|
                          DCD      0x2009c080
                  |L1.1012|
                          DCD      0x40030000
                  |L1.1016|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_DrawChar PROC
;;;427    
;;;428    void GLCD_DrawChar (unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned short *c) {
0003fc  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
000400  460e              MOV      r6,r1
;;;429      int idx = 0, i, j;
;;;430    
;;;431      x = WIDTH-x-CHAR_W;
000402  f5c07498          RSB      r4,r0,#0x130
;;;432      wr_reg(0x50, y);                      /* Horizontal GRAM Start Address      */
000406  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
000408  4615              MOV      r5,r2                 ;428
00040a  2700              MOVS     r7,#0                 ;429
00040c  4688              MOV      r8,r1
00040e  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
000410  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;433      wr_reg(0x51, y+CHAR_H-1);             /* Horizontal GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000414  3617              ADDS     r6,r6,#0x17
000416  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
000418  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
00041a  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;434      wr_reg(0x52, x);                      /* Vertical   GRAM Start Address      */
00041e  b2a1              UXTH     r1,r4
000420  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000422  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
000424  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;435      wr_reg(0x53, x+CHAR_W-1);             /* Vertical   GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000428  340f              ADDS     r4,r4,#0xf
00042a  b2a1              UXTH     r1,r4
00042c  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00042e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
000432  4641              MOV      r1,r8
;;;436    
;;;437      wr_reg(0x20, y);
000434  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000436  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
00043a  4631              MOV      r1,r6
;;;438      wr_reg(0x21, x);
00043c  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
00043e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;439      wr_cmd(0x22);
000442  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
000444  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;440      wr_dat_start();
000448  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_start
;;;441      for (j = 0; j < CHAR_H; j++) {
;;;442        for (i = CHAR_W-1; i >= 0; i--) {
;;;443          if((c[idx] & (1 << i)) == 0x00) {
;;;444            wr_dat_only(BackColor);
00044c  f8df82b0          LDR      r8,|L1.1792|
000450  2600              MOVS     r6,#0                 ;441
000452  f04f0901          MOV      r9,#1                 ;443
                  |L1.1110|
000456  240f              MOVS     r4,#0xf               ;442
                  |L1.1112|
000458  f8351017          LDRH     r1,[r5,r7,LSL #1]     ;443
00045c  fa09f004          LSL      r0,r9,r4              ;443
000460  4201              TST      r1,r0                 ;443
;;;445          } else {
;;;446            wr_dat_only(TextColor);
000462  4640              MOV      r0,r8
000464  d00d              BEQ      |L1.1154|
000466  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; TextColor
                  |L1.1128|
000468  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_only
00046c  1e64              SUBS     r4,r4,#1              ;442
00046e  d5f3              BPL      |L1.1112|
;;;447          }
;;;448        }
;;;449        c++;
000470  1cad              ADDS     r5,r5,#2
000472  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1              ;441
000474  2e18              CMP      r6,#0x18              ;441
000476  dbee              BLT      |L1.1110|
000478  49a2              LDR      r1,|L1.1796|
00047a  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40              ;441
00047c  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]         ;441
                  |L1.1150|
;;;450      }
;;;451      wr_dat_stop();
;;;452    }
00047e  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L1.1154|
000482  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]            ;444  ; BackColor
000484  e7f0              B        |L1.1128|
;;;453    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_DisplayChar PROC
;;;462    
;;;463    void GLCD_DisplayChar (unsigned int ln, unsigned int col, unsigned char c) {
000486  3a20              SUBS     r2,r2,#0x20
;;;464    
;;;465      c -= 32;
000488  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;466      GLCD_DrawChar(col * CHAR_W, ln * CHAR_H, (unsigned short *)&Font_24x16[c * CHAR_H]);
00048a  4b9f              LDR      r3,|L1.1800|
00048c  eb020242          ADD      r2,r2,r2,LSL #1
000490  eb031202          ADD      r2,r3,r2,LSL #4
000494  eb000040          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #1
000498  00c3              LSLS     r3,r0,#3
00049a  0108              LSLS     r0,r1,#4
00049c  4619              MOV      r1,r3
00049e  e7fe              B        GLCD_DrawChar
;;;467    }
;;;468    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_DisplayString PROC
;;;477    
;;;478    void GLCD_DisplayString (unsigned int ln, unsigned int col, unsigned char *s) {
0004a0  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
0004a2  4605              MOV      r5,r0
0004a4  460e              MOV      r6,r1
0004a6  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;479    
;;;480      GLCD_WindowMax();
0004a8  f7fffffe          BL       GLCD_WindowMax
;;;481      while (*s) {
0004ac  e005              B        |L1.1210|
                  |L1.1198|
;;;482        GLCD_DisplayChar(ln, col++, *s++);
0004ae  4631              MOV      r1,r6
0004b0  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
0004b2  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1
0004b4  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0004b6  f7fffffe          BL       GLCD_DisplayChar
                  |L1.1210|
0004ba  7822              LDRB     r2,[r4,#0]            ;481
0004bc  2a00              CMP      r2,#0                 ;481
0004be  d1f6              BNE      |L1.1198|
;;;483      }
;;;484    }
0004c0  e791              B        |L1.998|
;;;485    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_ClearLn PROC
;;;492    
;;;493    void GLCD_ClearLn (unsigned int ln) {
0004c2  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
0004c4  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;494    
;;;495      GLCD_WindowMax();
0004c6  f7fffffe          BL       GLCD_WindowMax
;;;496      GLCD_DisplayString(ln, 0, "                    ");
0004ca  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0004cc  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0004d0  a28e              ADR      r2,|L1.1804|
0004d2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0004d4  e7fe              B        GLCD_DisplayString
;;;497    }
;;;498    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_Bargraph PROC
;;;507    
;;;508    void GLCD_Bargraph (unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int w, unsigned int h, unsigned int val) {
0004d6  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
0004da  460e              MOV      r6,r1
;;;509      int i,j;
;;;510    
;;;511      x = WIDTH-x-w;
0004dc  f5c070a0          RSB      r0,r0,#0x140
0004e0  1a87              SUBS     r7,r0,r2
;;;512      wr_reg(0x50, y);                      /* Horizontal GRAM Start Address      */
0004e2  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
0004e4  4615              MOV      r5,r2                 ;508
0004e6  4698              MOV      r8,r3                 ;508
0004e8  460c              MOV      r4,r1
0004ea  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
0004ec  f8dd9020          LDR      r9,[sp,#0x20]
0004f0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;513      wr_reg(0x51, y+CHAR_H-1);             /* Horizontal GRAM End   Address (-1) */
0004f4  3617              ADDS     r6,r6,#0x17
0004f6  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
0004f8  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
0004fa  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;514      wr_reg(0x52, x);                      /* Vertical   GRAM Start Address      */
0004fe  b2b9              UXTH     r1,r7
000500  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000502  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
000504  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;515      wr_reg(0x53, x+w-1);                  /* Vertical   GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000508  1978              ADDS     r0,r7,r5
00050a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00050c  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
00050e  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
000510  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;516    
;;;517      val = (val * w) >> 10;                /* Scale value for 24x12 characters   */
000514  fb09f005          MUL      r0,r9,r5
000518  0a87              LSRS     r7,r0,#10
00051a  4621              MOV      r1,r4
;;;518      wr_reg(0x20, y);
00051c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00051e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
000522  4631              MOV      r1,r6
;;;519      wr_reg(0x21, x);
000524  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
000526  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;520      wr_cmd(0x22);
00052a  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
00052c  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;521      wr_dat_start();
000530  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_start
;;;522      for (i = 0; i < h; i++) {
000534  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;523        for (j = w-1; j >= 0; j--) {
;;;524          if(j >= val) {
;;;525            wr_dat_only(BackColor);
000536  f8df91c8          LDR      r9,|L1.1792|
00053a  e00c              B        |L1.1366|
                  |L1.1340|
00053c  1e6c              SUBS     r4,r5,#1              ;523
00053e  d409              BMI      |L1.1364|
                  |L1.1344|
000540  42bc              CMP      r4,r7                 ;524
;;;526          } else {
;;;527            wr_dat_only(TextColor);
000542  4648              MOV      r0,r9
000544  d301              BCC      |L1.1354|
000546  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]            ;525  ; BackColor
000548  e000              B        |L1.1356|
                  |L1.1354|
00054a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; TextColor
                  |L1.1356|
00054c  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_only
000550  1e64              SUBS     r4,r4,#1              ;523
000552  d5f5              BPL      |L1.1344|
                  |L1.1364|
000554  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1              ;522
                  |L1.1366|
000556  4546              CMP      r6,r8                 ;522
000558  d3f0              BCC      |L1.1340|
00055a  496a              LDR      r1,|L1.1796|
00055c  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40              ;522
00055e  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]         ;522
;;;528          }
;;;529        }
;;;530      }
;;;531      wr_dat_stop();
;;;532    }
000560  e78d              B        |L1.1150|
;;;533    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_Bitmap PROC
;;;546    
;;;547    void GLCD_Bitmap (unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int w, unsigned int h, unsigned char *bitmap) {
000562  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
000566  460f              MOV      r7,r1
;;;548      unsigned int    i, j;
;;;549      unsigned short *bitmap_ptr = (unsigned short *)bitmap;
;;;550    
;;;551      x = WIDTH-x-w;
000568  f5c070a0          RSB      r0,r0,#0x140
00056c  1a86              SUBS     r6,r0,r2
;;;552      wr_reg(0x50, y);                      /* Horizontal GRAM Start Address      */
00056e  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
000570  4614              MOV      r4,r2                 ;547
000572  4698              MOV      r8,r3                 ;547
000574  4689              MOV      r9,r1
000576  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
000578  9d08              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x20]
00057a  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;553      wr_reg(0x51, y+h-1);                  /* Horizontal GRAM End   Address (-1) */
00057e  eb070008          ADD      r0,r7,r8
000582  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000584  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
000586  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
000588  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;554      wr_reg(0x52, x);                      /* Vertical   GRAM Start Address      */
00058c  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
00058e  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000590  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
000592  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;555      wr_reg(0x53, x+w-1);                  /* Vertical   GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000596  1930              ADDS     r0,r6,r4
000598  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00059a  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
00059c  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00059e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
0005a2  4649              MOV      r1,r9
;;;556    
;;;557      wr_reg(0x20, y);
0005a4  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0005a6  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
0005aa  4639              MOV      r1,r7
;;;558      wr_reg(0x21, x);
0005ac  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
0005ae  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;559      wr_cmd(0x22);
0005b2  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
0005b4  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;560      wr_dat_start();
0005b8  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_start
;;;561      for (j = 0; j < h; j++) {
0005bc  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
0005be  e010              B        |L1.1506|
                  |L1.1472|
;;;562        bitmap_ptr += w-1;
0005c0  eb050544          ADD      r5,r5,r4,LSL #1
0005c4  1ead              SUBS     r5,r5,#2
;;;563        for (i = 0; i < w; i++) {
0005c6  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
0005c8  e005              B        |L1.1494|
;;;564          wr_dat_only(*bitmap_ptr--);
0005ca  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1484|
0005cc  f8350902          LDRH     r0,[r5],#-2
0005d0  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_only
0005d4  1c7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#1              ;563
                  |L1.1494|
0005d6  42a7              CMP      r7,r4                 ;563
0005d8  d3f8              BCC      |L1.1484|
;;;565        }
;;;566        bitmap_ptr += w+1;
0005da  eb050544          ADD      r5,r5,r4,LSL #1
0005de  1cad              ADDS     r5,r5,#2
0005e0  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1              ;561
                  |L1.1506|
0005e2  4546              CMP      r6,r8                 ;561
0005e4  d3ec              BCC      |L1.1472|
0005e6  4947              LDR      r1,|L1.1796|
0005e8  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40              ;561
0005ea  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]         ;561
;;;567      }
;;;568      wr_dat_stop();
;;;569    }
0005ec  e747              B        |L1.1150|
;;;570    
                          ENDP

                  GLCD_Bmp PROC
;;;583    
;;;584    void GLCD_Bmp (unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int w, unsigned int h, unsigned char *bmp) {
0005ee  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
0005f2  460f              MOV      r7,r1
;;;585      unsigned int    i, j;
;;;586      unsigned short *bitmap_ptr = (unsigned short *)bmp;
;;;587    
;;;588      x = WIDTH-x-w;
0005f4  f5c070a0          RSB      r0,r0,#0x140
0005f8  1a85              SUBS     r5,r0,r2
;;;589      wr_reg(0x50, y);                      /* Horizontal GRAM Start Address      */
0005fa  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
0005fc  4614              MOV      r4,r2                 ;584
0005fe  461e              MOV      r6,r3                 ;584
000600  4689              MOV      r9,r1
000602  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
000604  f8dd8020          LDR      r8,[sp,#0x20]
000608  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;590      wr_reg(0x51, y+h-1);                  /* Horizontal GRAM End   Address (-1) */
00060c  19b8              ADDS     r0,r7,r6
00060e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000610  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
000612  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
000614  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;591      wr_reg(0x52, x);                      /* Vertical   GRAM Start Address      */
000618  b2a9              UXTH     r1,r5
00061a  460f              MOV      r7,r1
00061c  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
00061e  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;592      wr_reg(0x53, x+w-1);                  /* Vertical   GRAM End   Address (-1) */
000622  1928              ADDS     r0,r5,r4
000624  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000626  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
000628  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00062a  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
00062e  4649              MOV      r1,r9
;;;593    
;;;594      wr_reg(0x20, y);
000630  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000632  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
000636  4639              MOV      r1,r7
;;;595      wr_reg(0x21, x);
000638  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
00063a  f7fffffe          BL       wr_reg
;;;596      wr_cmd(0x22);
00063e  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
000640  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;597      wr_dat_start();
000644  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_start
;;;598      bitmap_ptr += (h*w)-1;
000648  fb06f004          MUL      r0,r6,r4
00064c  eb080540          ADD      r5,r8,r0,LSL #1
000650  1ead              SUBS     r5,r5,#2
;;;599      for (j = 0; j < h; j++) {
000652  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000654  e00b              B        |L1.1646|
                  |L1.1622|
;;;600        for (i = 0; i < w; i++) {
000656  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
000658  e005              B        |L1.1638|
;;;601          wr_dat_only(*bitmap_ptr--);
00065a  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1628|
00065c  f8350902          LDRH     r0,[r5],#-2
000660  f7fffffe          BL       wr_dat_only
000664  1c7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#1              ;600
                  |L1.1638|
000666  42a7              CMP      r7,r4                 ;600
000668  d3f8              BCC      |L1.1628|
00066a  f1080001          ADD      r0,r8,#1              ;599
                  |L1.1646|
00066e  4680              MOV      r8,r0                 ;599
000670  42b0              CMP      r0,r6                 ;599
000672  d3f0              BCC      |L1.1622|
000674  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.1796|
000676  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40              ;599
000678  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]         ;599
;;;602        }
;;;603      }
;;;604      wr_dat_stop();
;;;605    }
00067a  e700              B        |L1.1150|
;;;606    
                          ENDP

                  delay PROC
;;;73     
;;;74     static void delay (int cnt) {
00067c  0480              LSLS     r0,r0,#18
                  |L1.1662|
;;;75     
;;;76       cnt <<= DELAY_2N;
;;;77       while (cnt--);
00067e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000680  d2fd              BCS      |L1.1662|
;;;78     }
000682  4770              BX       lr
;;;79     
                          ENDP

                  spi_send PROC
;;;86     
;;;87     static __inline unsigned char spi_send (unsigned char byte) {
000684  4927              LDR      r1,|L1.1828|
;;;88     
;;;89       LPC_SSP1->DR = byte;
000686  6088              STR      r0,[r1,#8]
                  |L1.1672|
;;;90       while (!(LPC_SSP1->SR & RNE));        /* Wait for send to finish            */
000688  68c8              LDR      r0,[r1,#0xc]
00068a  0740              LSLS     r0,r0,#29
00068c  d5fc              BPL      |L1.1672|
;;;91       return (LPC_SSP1->DR);
00068e  6888              LDR      r0,[r1,#8]
000690  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;92     }
000692  4770              BX       lr
;;;93     
                          ENDP

                  wr_cmd PROC
;;;100    
;;;101    static __inline void wr_cmd (unsigned char c) {
000694  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;102    
;;;103      LCD_CS(0)
000696  4d1b              LDR      r5,|L1.1796|
000698  2440              MOVS     r4,#0x40
00069a  4606              MOV      r6,r0                 ;101
00069c  61ec              STR      r4,[r5,#0x1c]
;;;104      spi_send(SPI_START | SPI_WR | SPI_INDEX);   /* Write : RS = 0, RW = 0       */
00069e  2070              MOVS     r0,#0x70
0006a0  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;105      spi_send(0);
0006a4  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0006a6  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;106      spi_send(c);
0006aa  4630              MOV      r0,r6
0006ac  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;107      LCD_CS(1)
0006b0  61ac              STR      r4,[r5,#0x18]
;;;108    }
0006b2  e698              B        |L1.998|
;;;109    
                          ENDP

                  wr_dat PROC
;;;116    
;;;117    static __inline void wr_dat (unsigned short c) {
0006b4  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;118    
;;;119      LCD_CS(0)
0006b6  4e13              LDR      r6,|L1.1796|
0006b8  2540              MOVS     r5,#0x40
0006ba  4604              MOV      r4,r0                 ;117
0006bc  61f5              STR      r5,[r6,#0x1c]
;;;120      spi_send(SPI_START | SPI_WR | SPI_DATA);    /* Write : RS = 1, RW = 0       */
0006be  2072              MOVS     r0,#0x72
0006c0  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;121      spi_send((c >>   8));                       /* Write D8..D15                */
0006c4  0a20              LSRS     r0,r4,#8
0006c6  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;122      spi_send((c & 0xFF));                       /* Write D0..D7                 */
0006ca  b2e0              UXTB     r0,r4
0006cc  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;123      LCD_CS(1)
0006d0  61b5              STR      r5,[r6,#0x18]
;;;124    }
0006d2  e688              B        |L1.998|
;;;125    
                          ENDP

                  wr_dat_start PROC
;;;132    
;;;133    static __inline void wr_dat_start (void) {
0006d4  490b              LDR      r1,|L1.1796|
;;;134    
;;;135      LCD_CS(0)
0006d6  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40
0006d8  61c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;136      spi_send(SPI_START | SPI_WR | SPI_DATA);    /* Write : RS = 1, RW = 0       */
0006da  2072              MOVS     r0,#0x72
0006dc  e7fe              B        spi_send
;;;137    }
;;;138    
                          ENDP

                  wr_dat_only PROC
;;;157    
;;;158    static __inline void wr_dat_only (unsigned short c) {
0006de  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
0006e0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;159    
;;;160      spi_send((c >>   8));                       /* Write D8..D15                */
0006e2  0a00              LSRS     r0,r0,#8
0006e4  f7fffffe          BL       spi_send
;;;161      spi_send((c & 0xFF));                       /* Write D0..D7                 */
0006e8  b2e0              UXTB     r0,r4
0006ea  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0006ee  e7fe              B        spi_send
;;;162    }
;;;163    
                          ENDP

                  wr_reg PROC
;;;189    
;;;190    static __inline void wr_reg (unsigned char reg, unsigned short val) {
0006f0  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
0006f2  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;191    
;;;192      wr_cmd(reg);
0006f4  f7fffffe          BL       wr_cmd
;;;193      wr_dat(val);
0006f8  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0006fa  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0006fe  e7fe              B        wr_dat
;;;194    }
;;;195    
                          ENDP

                  |L1.1792|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L1.1796|
                          DCD      0x2009c000
                  |L1.1800|
                          DCD      ||.constdata||
                  |L1.1804|
00070c  20202020          DCB      "                    ",0
000710  20202020
000714  20202020
000718  20202020
00071c  20202020
000720  00      
000721  00                DCB      0
000722  00                DCB      0
000723  00                DCB      0
                  |L1.1828|
                          DCD      0x40030000

                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=1
